name: French Onion Soup
liquid_texture: A bowl of French Onion Soup typically has a rich and slightly translucent liquid base.
onion_slices: Visible slices of caramelized onions floating in the soup.
cheese_topping: Melted cheese on top of the soup, often with strands extending from the spoon.
croutons: Pieces of toasted bread or croutons partially submerged in the soup.

name: Deviled Eggs
halves: Deviled eggs are typically presented as halved boiled eggs.

garnish: Chopped herbs or other small garnishes can be seen on top.

name: Prime Rib
roasted_meat: A large, well-cooked piece of prime rib with a crusty outer layer.

juices: Juices may be visible on the surface or on the plate.
bone: Depending on the presentation, a bone may be attached to the meat.

name: Mussels
shells: Closed or slightly open mussel shells arranged in a dish.

name: French Fries

salt_seasoning: Visible salt crystals or seasoning on the surface.

name: Tacos

name: Breakfast Burrito
rolled_tortilla: A tortilla is filled and rolled around the ingredients.
scrambled_eggs: Scrambled eggs are a common filling.
breakfast_ingredients: Ingredients like bacon, sausage, cheese, and vegetables are added.
portable_meal: Breakfast burritos are often eaten on the go.

name: Greek Salad
colorful_vegetables: Greek salad features vibrant and colorful vegetables like tomatoes, cucumbers, and bell peppers.
feta_cheese: Chunks of feta cheese are often scattered over the salad.
olives: Whole or sliced olives are a key ingredient.
olive_oil_and_oregano: The salad is dressed with olive oil and sprinkled with oregano.

name: Red Velvet Cake
red_hue: Red velvet cake has a distinctive reddish color.
cream_cheese_frosting: The cake is often covered in cream cheese frosting.
layered_structure: Red velvet cake is typically presented as layered slices.
cocoa_flavor: The cake has a subtle cocoa flavor.

name: Lobster Bisque
creamy_soup: Lobster bisque features a creamy and rich soup base.
lobster_chunks: Chunks of lobster meat are often visible in the soup.
garnish: Chopped chives or parsley might be used for garnish.
seafood_flavor: The soup has a distinct seafood flavor.

name: Chicken Curry
sauce_appearance: Chicken curry is served with a flavorful sauce.
chicken_pieces: Tender pieces of chicken are immersed in the sauce.
spices_and_herbs: A variety of spices and herbs flavor the dish.
accompaniments: Rice or bread is often served with chicken curry.

name: Churros
stick_shape: Churros are long, stick-like fried pastries.
sugar_coating: The churros are coated in cinnamon and sugar.
crispy_exterior: Churros have a crispy and crunchy exterior.
dipping_sauce: Chocolate sauce or caramel sauce is often served for dipping.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
sandwich_appearance: Grilled cheese sandwiches consist of toasted bread with melted cheese in the middle.
melted_cheese: The cheese inside the sandwich is melted and gooey.
buttered_crust: The outer crust of the bread is often buttered and toasted.
dipping: Some may serve the sandwich with tomato soup for dipping.

name: Peking Duck
roasted_duck: Peking duck is known for its crispy roasted skin.
pancakes: The duck is often served with thin pancakes for wrapping.
hoisin_sauce: The duck is commonly served with hoisin sauce.
scallions_and_cucumbers: Slices of scallions and cucumbers are added to the wrap.

name: Macarons
almond_meringue_cookies: Macarons are delicate almond meringue cookies.
sandwiched: Two cookies are sandwiched with a filling, often ganache or buttercream.
assorted_colors: Macarons come in a variety of vibrant colors.
smooth_texture: The outer shell is smooth and slightly crispy.

name: Club Sandwich
layered_structure: Club sandwiches are layered with multiple fillings.
toasted_bread: The bread is usually toasted and layered with ingredients.
bacon_and_turkey: Slices of bacon and turkey are common fillings.
toothpick_skewers: The sandwich might be held together with toothpicks.

name: Dumplings
various_shapes: Dumplings come in various shapes, such as crescent or folded.
filling_visible: The filling, often meat or vegetables, is visible through the wrapper.
steamed_or_fried: Dumplings can be steamed or fried.
dipping_sauce: A dipping sauce like soy-based sauce is common.

name: Chocolate Mousse
fluffy_texture: Chocolate mousse has a light and airy texture.
chocolate_flavor: The dessert is rich in chocolate flavor.
whipped_cream: Whipped cream is often folded into the mousse.
individual_servings: Chocolate mousse is often served in small cups.

name: Creme Brulee
custard_base: Crème brûlée features a creamy custard base.
caramelized_sugar: The top is torched to create a crispy caramelized layer.
ramekin_presentation: The dessert is often served in individual ramekins.
vanilla_flavor: Crème brûlée is often flavored with vanilla.

name: Gnocchi
potato_texture: The dough is often made with potatoes, giving it a soft texture.
pillowy_shape: Gnocchi are typically shaped with ridges to hold sauce.
sauce_coating: Gnocchi are often coated in sauce, such as pesto or marinara.

name: Cannoli
ricotta_filling: The shells are filled with sweet ricotta cheese filling.
dusting_of_powdered_sugar: The ends are often dusted with powdered sugar.
chocolate_chips_or_pistachios: The ends might be dipped in chocolate chips or pistachios.

name: Pizza
pizza_dough_crust: The base is made from pizza dough that's baked.
toppings: Ingredients like tomato sauce, cheese, and various toppings cover the pizza.
slices: Pizza is typically served in triangular slices.

name: Steak
cooked_meat: A well-cooked piece of steak, often seared.
cuts: Different cuts have distinct appearances, such as ribeye or filet mignon.
grilled_marks: The steak might have grill marks.
red_or_pink_interior: The interior color varies depending on the desired doneness.

name: Hot and Sour Soup
broth_appearance: Hot and sour soup has a flavorful broth.
spices_and_flavors: The soup is often flavored with vinegar, pepper, and other spices.
tofu_and_mushrooms: Cubes of tofu and sliced mushrooms are common ingredients.
egg_ribbons: Whisked eggs create thin ribbons in the soup.

name: Cup cakes
frosting_swirl: The top is often covered with a swirl of frosting.
decorations: Sprinkles, edible flowers, or small toppers might be added.
liners: Cupcakes are typically baked in paper or foil liners.
